thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com
thread.title: Patricia Cyr
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Patricia Cyr

author: Patricia Cyr
title: Patricia Cyr
text: I bought the shower head and the wand. Great product. I can feel the difference on my skin and hair. I have a lot of minerals in my water which turns everything blue. Customer service was very helpful when I needed a few questions answered. Shipping was great and I will make my purchases from you again. Thanks for making this a positive experience.
